contentrichtext.text: {{Merge from|West Friesland (historical region)|discuss=Talk:West Friesland (region)#Merge|date=September 2012}} :''For the historical region also named West Friesland, see [[West Friesland (historical region)]] [[File:West Friesland-Position.png|thumb|right|The contemporary region of West Friesland highlighted on a map of the Netherlands]] '''West Friesland''' (also '''West Frisia'''; {{lang-nl|West-Friesland}}; [[West Frisian language|West Frisian]]: ''West-Fryslân'') is a contemporary region in the northwestern [[Netherlands]], in the province of [[North Holland]]. == Municipalities == The [[region]] covers an area of about {{convert|800|km²|0|abbr=on}}, delineated by the [[Westfriese Omringdijk]]. It consists of the municipalities of: {| class="toccolours" style="margin: 0 2em 0 0em;" |'''[[Dutch language|Dutch]] name'''||'''''[[West Frisian (dialect)|West Frisian]] Name''''' |- |[[Alkmaar]] ||''Alkmar'' |- |[[Andijk]]||''Andoik'' <ref name="Medemblik">Former municipality, since 2011 part of [[Medemblik]].</ref> |- |[[Drechterland]]||''Drechterland'' |- |[[Enkhuizen]]||''Henkhúze'' |- |[[Harenkarspel]]||''Harenkarspel'' <ref>Former municipality, since 2013 part of [[Schagen]].</ref> |- |[[Heerhugowaard]]||''Heerhugoweerd'' or ''Heregeweerd'' |- |[[Hoorn]]||''Hoorn'' |- |[[Koggenland]]||''Koggeland'' |- |[[Langedijk]]||''Lengedoik'' |- |[[Medemblik]]||''Memeloik'' |- |[[Niedorp]] ||''Nierup'' <ref>Former municipality, since 2012 part of [[Hollands Kroon]].</ref> |- |[[Opmeer]]||''Obmar'' or ''Opmar'' |- |[[Schagen]]||''Skagen'' |- |[[Stede Broec]]||''Stee Broek'' |- |[[Venhuizen]]||''Venhûze'' <ref>Former municipality, since 2006 part of [[Drechterland]].</ref> |- |[[Wervershoof]]||''Wurrevershouf'' <ref name="Medemblik"/> |} Major cities include Hoorn and Alkmaar. ==Dialect== The traditional dialect of the region is the [[West Frisian (dialect)|West Frisian dialect]] of [[Hollandic]] Dutch. The contemporary region is similar in size and location to the historical district (''[[Gau (country subdivision)|gouw]]'') of '''[[Westflinge]]''' which itself was a part of a much larger [[West Friesland (historical region)|historical region of '''West Friesland''']]. <gallery> Image:West-Friesland vlag.svg|Westfrisian flag Image:All Frisian flag Scandinavial model .svg|Interfrisian flag </gallery> ==See also== *[[Frisia]] == References == {{reflist}} == External links == *[http://www.west-friesland.com/ The region website] (in Dutch and partly Westfrisian) {{coord|52|41|N|5|00|E|source:nlwiki_region:NL_scale:200000|display=title}} [[Category:Regions of the Netherlands]] [[Category:Geography of North Holland]] [[Category:West Frisia]] {{NorthHolland-geo-stub}}
